content.html:
IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Still Photography)

Editing Custom Settings


Edit existing custom settings banks.

1 Select I.Q. IMAGE QUALITY SETTING > EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM
SETTING in the shooting menu and press MENU/OK.

2 Highlight the desired custom set-
tings bank and press MENU/OK.

3 Highlight EDIT/CHECK and press
MENU/OK.

4 The camera will display a list of shoot-
ing menu items; highlight an item you
wish to edit and press MENU/OK.
Adjust the selected item as desired.


EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM SETTING
I.Q.C1 CUSTOM 1
AMFC2 CUSTOM 2
C3 CUSTOM 3
丝C4 CUSTOM 4
C5 CREATE NEW
BC6 CREATE NEW
C7 CREATE NEW
C1 CUSTOM 1
EDIT/CHECKSAVE THE CHANGES
RESET THE CHANGES
COPY
ERASE
EDIT CUSTOM NAME
C1 CUSTOM 1 EDIT/CHECK 1 /3
I.QIMAGE SIZE
MF ↓IMAGE QUALITY
RAW RECORDING
FILM SIMULATION
MONOCHROMATIC COLOR
GRAIN EFFECT
COLOR CHROME EFFECT
COLOR CHROME FX BLUE Q SAVE BACK EXIT

5 Press MENU/OK to save the changes and return to the shooting
menu list.
Adjust additional items as desired.


If DISABLE is selected for AUTO UPDATE CUSTOM SETTING, red


dots will appear next to the edited items but the changes will not be
saved automatically.


● To save the changes for selected items, highlight the items in the
list and press Q.
● To save changes for all items, return to Step 3 and select SAVE THE
CHANGES. To cancel all changes and restore the previous settings,
select RESET THE CHANGES.
● Ifyou copy an item marked by a red dot, the item will be copied with
the changes intact.


6

Shooting
Menus

content.markdown:
IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Still Photography)

# Editing Custom Settings

# Edit existing custom settings banks.

- 1 Select I.Q. IMAGE QUALITY SETTING > EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM
- SETTING in the shooting menu and press MENU/OK.


- 2 Highlight the desired custom set-
- tings bank and press MENU/OK.


3 Highlight EDIT/CHECK and press
MENU/OK.

4 The camera will display a list of shoot-
ing menu items; highlight an item you
wish to edit and press MENU/OK.
Adjust the selected item as desired.

|  | EDIT/SAVE CUSTOM SETTING |
| --- | --- |
| I.Q. | C1 CUSTOM 1 |
| AMF | C2 CUSTOM 2 |
|  | C3 CUSTOM 3 |
| 丝 | C4 CUSTOM 4 |
|  | C5 CREATE NEW |
| B | C6 CREATE NEW |
|  | C7 CREATE NEW |


|  | C1 CUSTOM 1 |
| --- | --- |
| EDIT/CHECK | SAVE THE CHANGES |
|  | RESET THE CHANGES |
|  | COPY |
|  | ERASE |
|  | EDIT CUSTOM NAME |


|  | C1 CUSTOM 1 EDIT/CHECK 1 /3 |
| --- | --- |
| I.Q | IMAGE SIZE |
| MF ↓ | IMAGE QUALITY |
| MF ↓ | RAW RECORDING |
| MF ↓ | FILM SIMULATION |
| MF ↓ | MONOCHROMATIC COLOR |
| MF ↓ | GRAIN EFFECT |
| MF ↓ | COLOR CHROME EFFECT |
| MF ↓ | COLOR CHROME FX BLUE Q SAVE BACK EXIT |


5 Press MENU/OK to save the changes and return to the shooting
menu list.
Adjust additional items as desired.

If DISABLE is selected for AUTO UPDATE CUSTOM SETTING, red

dots will appear next to the edited items but the changes will not be
saved automatically.

- ● To save the changes for selected items, highlight the items in the
- list and press Q.
- ● To save changes for all items, return to Step 3 and select SAVE THE
- CHANGES. To cancel all changes and restore the previous settings,
- select RESET THE CHANGES.
- ● Ifyou copy an item marked by a red dot, the item will be copied with
- the changes intact.


6

Shooting
Menus
